snippet: Grizzlies are learning to raid coops, eating chickens and threatening people, which puts bears at risk of being euthanized.
abstract: Grizzly bears in northwestern Montana have developed a taste for poultry as more homeowners in the area are raising their own chickens; the trend puts the bears at risk of being euthanized due to the fact that their acquired taste for chicken will make them a continual danger to people.
lead_paragraph: Grizzlies are learning to raid coops, eating chickens and threatening people, which puts bears at risk of being euthanized.

headline.seo: Grizzly Bears’ Taste for Chicken Puts Them in Danger
headline.main: Bears’ Taste for Chicken Sets Up Collision Course
headline.print_headline: Bears’ Taste for Chicken Sets Up Collision Course
